players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was found dead so suddenly. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our grasp."
Charlie: "I'm concerned about Alice's sudden death and think we should all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our village."
Diana: "Let's all keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our grasp. We need to work together if we want to survive."
